values:
We had out first real senior event today. it turned out to be hella fun. the perfect people were there. then after we went to kel's and decided on our trip after we graduate. We have 5 days til we start school and we are already planning our grad parties. Basically 8 days and 7 nights of getting hammered with some of the coolest people i know. 

Along with this trip comes a load of responsibilities. Sooooo scary. But we can do it. No no..we WILL do it. 

COME ALONG lets go get wasted away again in margerita-ville Shan!!

Chels we supply the men lol

Ari will get us into the clubs.

I will get everyone the beads from my flashing the crowds lol

Kel will grow some balls and drink.

I cant wait. i love being a Senior

tonights the last night my sister will be home until December. i cant handle this. i dont even know how many times ive cried tonight. we had a huge family dinner and i was fine until her friend Katie came over. Katie started to cry hysterically and i just lost it. i tried to so hard not to because i didnt want to show Steph that i was sad. i will miss her sooo much =o( not everyone is as lucky as i am to have their best friend be their sister as well. goodbye stephanie

summer has been awesome. lately, ive been trying to soak up every last second of being with my sister before she leaves on the 15th for italy till december. im gonna miss her like hell. Its awesome that Shannon and my sister are hitting it off as well as they are. Steph seems to want to hang out with her as much i as do lol. o well. no harm in that. im getting ready to miss people tho. this summer has been quite a rollercoster of relationships...i've had my share of 'flings' but in each i have always had the thought of "summer will end soon and they will leave..." so i've been telling myself that. but from this entire summer i have gained strenth in my constants. Jordan...its amazing to me that after 2 years of be living here that you and i are stronger than ever. i love you so much and it just shows how much we mean to each other. We will always have each other. Shannon, its so awesome that we can hang out as much as we do and not once have i gotten sick of you. we always have so much fun together.(himalayaaaaaaaa) i love it. you both mean the world to me. thanx for everything. 

p.s. The Den = senior year to come =o)
im going to vegas!!!! woo hoo muther fuckers!!!
rock on!!!

And if I should fall, I know you're waiting
And if I should call, I know you're there
If ever you cry just know 
I'm in your heart tonight...

Part Shy Kisser

You *do* love to kiss, once your comfortable with it And that means knowing the person you're kissing pretty well You usually don't make the first move when it comes to making out But you've got plenty of intensity in return

Part Expert Kisser

You're a kissing pro, but it's all about quality and not quantity You've perfected your kissing technique and can knock anyone's socks off And you're adaptable, giving each partner what they crave When it comes down to it, your kisses are truly unforgettable
What Kind of Kisser Are You?

i am part of the coolest band ever. The WaterBottle Band! we play every 6th period at Agoura High School. Come check us out. We promise to play our hits like the fast one, the double hitter, and Arielle's favorite: The Belly Dancer. The members include me, and shannon and kinda Ali G. but she couldnt handle the fame. Ask me for tickets and if you have any questions about admission. Both are free....lol 

=o)

Stones taught me to fly


Love, taught me to lie


Life taught me to die


So it's not hard to fall
When you float like a cannon..


                             Stones taught me to fly
                                    Love taught me to cry
                                            so come on courage
                                                 Teach me to be shy
                                                      'Cause it's not hard to fall
                                                              And I don't wanna scare her            

                                                               It's not hard to fall                                                                         
                                                                                 And i dont wanna lose

 

 

It's not hard to grow                                                                                                
When you know that you just don't know

tomarow is my little twin sister's baby shower.
i dont know if i should be celebrating. 
the only thing im cheering for...is free drinks. 
i hate my dad. 
My stepmom asked me the other day
" Why do you think your father wont be a good father to these girls, he was there for you. He says he will always help"

and my answer is..

" i never saw my father when i was new born. Either he was going through medical school...or fucking other women."

the conversation usually ends there.

o well.

I drink good coffee every morning
It comes from a place thats far away
And when I'm done I feel like talking
Without you here there is less to say

Don't want you thinking I'm unhappy
What is closer to the truth
Is that if I lived till I was a hundred and two
I just dont think I'll ever get over you

I'm no longer moved to drink strong whiskey
I shook the hand of time and I knew
that if I lived till I could no longer climb my stairs
I just dont think I'll ever get over you

Your face it dances and it haunts me
your laughter is still ringing in my ears
I still find peices of your prescence here
even after all these years

I don't want you thinking that i dont get asked to dinner
cause I'm here to say that I sometimes do
and even though I may seem to feel a touch of love
I just dont think I'll ever get over you

if I live till I was a hundred and two
I just dont think I'll ever get over you

...so thats cool...

let her use a sweatshirt too, i hope she gives it back...

call her babe just like you used to call me that...

i knew from the moment you were transporting her sculpture that you liked her...

i guess you got over us very easily, now i'm just a blur...

you want my frienship, well im not ready yet...

take all the memories but i still have your hat.

its only been one month, what was love..must of been lust...

I dont want your things anymore..

cause all they do are just reminding me of you.

...These things take forever, I especially am slow
But I realized how I need you
And I wondered if I could come home
I remember the time you drove all night
Just to meet me in the morning...
Yeah I thought it was strange
You said everything changed
You felt as if you just woke up
And you said, "This is the first day of my life."
I'm glad I didn't die before I met you
Now I don't care, I could go anywhere with you
And I'd probably be happy ....

i know that people spend valentines day alone every year...but for some reason i am having a hard time this year.  Maybe its because i recently broke up with my boyfriend of 4 months...and i know that if we were still together that this day would of been amazing and filled with flowers and candy, ya know...the works. yea sure, sometimes i regret losing him, cause i know that some of the hard times recently would of been dramatically less if i had him. But i just keep my head up and tell myself i did it for a good reason. I cant look back and regret, its not healthy. Cause everything happens for a reason, right? well there are only 4 more hours of this "itch" and then moving on. And looking forward to next year. hopefully, i wont be alone.

When all our tears have reached the sea
Part of you will live in me
Way down deep inside my heart

The days keep coming without fail
No wind is gonna find your sail
That's where your journey starts

*Chorus*
You'll find better love
Strong as it ever was
Deep as a river runs
Warm as the morning sun
Please remember me

Just like the waves down by the shore
Gonna keep on coming back for more
'Cause we dont ever wanna start
Out in this brave world you see
Oh, the valleys and the peaks
and I can see you on the top

*Chorus*
You'll find better love
Strong as it ever was
Deep as a river runs
Warm as the morning sun
Please remember me

*Bridge*
Remember me when you're out walking
When snow falls high outside your door
Late at night your no sleeping
And moon-light falls across your floor
When I cant hurt you anymore

*Chorus*
You'll find better love
Strong as it ever was
Deep as a river runs
Warm as the morning sun
Please remember me
Please remember me

hey everybody...lets spread rumors! yeah, that sounds like fun.  o wait a second. someone retarded has already been doing that lately. woops, MY BAD!


ooooo i have a better idea. how about everyone be two faced and one day be chill and totally awesome, then the next be a total butt face! YIPEE!

last night was deffinately insane. haha wow looking back on it, im shocked. the mixture of types of people...lets go through the list lol...

i might have forgotten a few, and im sorry. i lost count of how many times Brit barfed, and Goldberg Nat, and Overton were talkin jiberish. deffinatley the weridest night i have had in a long time. =o)

I'm not gonna be immature and write about how broken i am. cause i dont feel like being pitty-ed. of course im struggleing, but im not about to annouce it to the world, that isnt something I would do. at this point, yeah i do miss him. i just dont have the words anymore. 
and its times like these that we turn to our friends for help and/or guidence. And no one says it better than my best friend forever...Kelly Clarkson. 
She wrote this song to help me. lol
"I woke up today 
Woke up wide awake 
In an empty bed 
Staring at an empty room 
I have myself to blame 
For the state I'm in today 
And now, dyin' doesn't seem so cruel 

And oh, I don't know what to say 
And I don't know anyway, anymore 

I hate myself for losing you 
I'm seeing it all so clear 
I hate myself for losing you 
What do you do when you look in the mirror 
And staring at you is why he's not here

You got what you deserved 
Hope your happy now 
Cause everytime I think of both of you 
It's killing me inside 
And now I dread each day 
Knowing that I can't be saved 
From the loneliness of living without you 

And oh, I don't know what do 
Not sure that I'll pull through 
I wish you'd know 

I hate myself for losing you 
I'm seeing it all so clear 
I hate myself for losing you 
What do you do when you look in the mirror 
And staring at you is why he's not here

I hate myself for losing you 

And oh, I don't know what to do 
Not sure that I'll pull through 
I wish you knew 
I wish you knew 
And oh, I don't know what to say 
And I don't know anyway, anymore 

I hate myself for losing you 
I'm seeing it all so, I'm seeing it all so clear 
I hate myself for losing you 
What do you do when you look in the mirror 
And staring at you is why he's not here

What do you say when everything you said 
Is the reason why he left you in the end 
How do you cry when every tear you shed
Won't ever bring him back again
I hate myself for loving you"
THANX Kel-bear!

what else can i say.

i think i've done enough talking for one day.

i broke up with Daniel today. 2 days before our 4 month anniversary. harsh, yes. nessicary, yes.

if someone as awsome as that isnt what i am looking for, then what the hell do i need. 

i feel sick.

Well you're just across the street
Looks a mile to my feet
I want to go to you
Funny how I'm nervous still
I've always been the easy kill
I guess I always will

Could it be that everything goes around by chance (chance)
Only one way that was always meant to be (be)
You kill me, you always know the perfect thing to say (heeey, and...)
I know what I should do but I just can't walk away

I can picture your face well
From the bar in my hotel
I wish I'd go to you
I'll pick up, put down the phone
Like your favorite Heatmiser song goes
'It's just like being alone'

Oh god, please don't tell me this has been in vain (vain)
I need answers to what all the waiting I've done means (means)
You kill me, You've got some nerve, I can't face your mistakes (heeey, heeey)
I know what I should do but I just can't turn away

So go on love
Leave while theres still hope for escape
Gotta take what you can these days
There's so much ahead
So much regrett
I know what you want to say
(Know what you want to say)
I know it but cant help feel indifferently
I loved you, and I should have said it
but tell me, just what has it ever meant?

I can't help it baby, this is who I am (am)
Sorry but I can't just go turn off how I feel (feel)
You kill me, You build me up, but just to watch me break (Heeey, heeey)I know what I should do but I just can't walk away

The glory of friendship is not the outstretched hand, nor the kindly smile, nor the joy of companionship; it is the spiritual inspiration that comes to one when you discover that someone else believes in you and is willing to trust you with a friendship.

                                                    -- Ralph Waldo Emerson

new years party
bachelor house
malibu
everyone that comes, stays the night
free alcohol

friday night. let me know if anyone is interested.
PAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAARRRRRRTAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAYYY

well, today was my operation.

it went well, the worst part was the injections, that hurt like a bitch ::tear::

but its all good, afterwords...i came home, took my pills then passed out. 

i woke up around 2 and right in front of me was my amazing boyfriend. He was giggleing with my sister and he was holding this litle labrador stuffed animal. Its one of the softest things i have ever touched. He is so good to me, of course i looked like crap cause i just woke up and i am under drugs lol

Its times like these, when we have no power to make any efforts to see others, that we see just who cares about you and who doesnt. Who is a friend because of your abilites or who honestly loves you. Even friends that dont have a license find a way to see you somehow. Shan, your awsome. I've received many calls and Chris, Danny and Shan came to see me. The dont know how much that meant to me. Granted i was alittle out of it when that all happened, but its things liek this that i will never forget. Thanx you guys.

so now im just chilling, i have no strength due to my meds right now. so looks like i am not gonna be running any marathons. if you wanna talk, ill be here. 

but on Monday i leave for Vegas to see 2 of the coolest people ever, im coming back the 30th i think. 
so. call my cell if you need me! =o)

p.s Andrea: you rock my socks to high heaven =o)

Well, its the 20 and you know what that means:

tomarrow i get my surgery
then wed is my mom's birthday
Saturday is Christmas
Monday i leave for vegas with my sis to see my best friends
i come back i think on the 30
then new years is a few days after

and during all of this craziness i still have YMCA work and homework to keep busy with.
Damn this is so hecktick. is that how you spell that? see im so preoccupied that i forgot how to spell. 
is that even a word? 

im scatter-brained
wish me luck cause i am going under the knife in less then 16 hours!!
Laying in my bed, wrapped in my red blanket, falling asleep in his arms = perfect

this is my last entry ever.  i am done with this live journal. sorry to disappoint you all, but since no one ever comments any ways...it doesnt really matter. see you all at school.
bye bye livejournal

last night my daddy took my bro, stepmom, and i to the Van Halen concert. at first i hella didnt wanna go. but i ended up getting a t-shirt and a good time out of the deal. it was amazing. Eddie can play the guitar like no other. then his son came out and played with him during his solo. Sammy isnt as good as David Lee but o well. Sammy makes great tequilla. he wins! muahahahahaha!

Alright well this is the last entry before i leave for New York, i think i would be much more happy if a bud coughcough was coming but o well my dads dumb. 
im sorry. 
i dont know where my head has been lately. im in such a funk maybe this getaway will be a breath of fresh air and make me see what i have waiting for me back at home. 
im scared for a few different reasons that i dont feel like going through. (like friends, family, etc.)
So, im out everyone.
Catch ya on the flip side.

so my best friend came out to spend a few days with me.
sometimes i am just speechless, shes such such an amazing person.
this time was some how different than any other. we had a huge talk and we got alot out. Alot of the things that my moving away put into the shadows came out and at times it was hard to talk about cause i had no control and in no way woud i have done anything to hurt her on purpose.
I guess its natural to be forced to "move on". It'll always hurt. I dont know why we are made for pain sometimes but all i know now is our friendship is the strongest its ever been. I used to not be able to listen to songs that made me thnk of Vegas or her, but its all good now.
This weekend was awsome.
I love you, Liz.


      

 

 


*****************************************************************************
I'll sing it one last time for you
Then we really have to go
You've been the only thing that's right
In all I've done

And I can barely look at you
But every single time I do
I know we'll make it anywhere
Away from here

Light up, light up
As if you have a choice
Even if you cannot hear my voice
I'll be right beside you dear

Louder louder
And we'll run for our lives
I can hardly speak I understand
Why you can't raise your voice to say

To think I might not see those eyes
Makes it so hard not to cry
And as we say our long goodbye
I nearly do

Light up...

Slower slower
We don't have time for that
All I want is to find an easier way
To get out of our little heads

Have heart my dear
We're bound to be afraid
Even if it's just for a few days
Making up for all this mess
******************************************************************************

ok...so im currently at my dad's house. he is trying to make corn and steak on the bbq but we have very little propane, therefore it is taking 3 hours to cook everything, yes it is very annoying. im pledging a change. thats it. i dont know what i did wrong for people to treat me like shit sometimes but im getting fed up with it all. Most of the time everything is awsome but there are a few people that i am just getting sooooooooo sick of that i cant take it any more. I think i am gonna be alittle distant and get away from things that annoy me, so if i stop talking to you im sorry.

Open up my eyes,
Flooded with daylight.
Another sleepless night turns color black and white.

With all the things I've said,
There is just regret.
Repeating in my head.

Hands into a fist,
Static in my head.
Now I'm sitting face to face with lonliness.

What did I expect?
Did I see forever
in you?

I never wanted it to hurt
more than it should.
I hope your satisfied,
I never could.

Time to close my eyes
Forget about this mess.
Tried to fix this tragic loss of innocence.

But how can I forget,
The things I haven't done.
When everything is dead?

With my hands around your neck
who will stop me now?
With my hands around your neck
who will stop me now?
with my hands around your neck
who will stop me now?
with my hands around your neck
who will stop me now?

Can't you see that you left me
here on my own.
Give me one good reason why I should let go now....

it sucks losing friends

 

 

 

 

*This photograph, i'll carry to my grave
I never lost so much as i did that day*

and color the coast with your smile
its the most genuine thing
that ive ever seen
i was so lost
but now i believe
and the coast
your smile is the most genuine thing
that ive ever seen
i was so lost
but now i believe
and i believe
now i believe
now i believe

 

 

 

this is to the best smile i have ever seen

Gemini-------------------------

Your positive traits: 

Your lively, outgoing attitude attracts people to you everywhere you go.
You can talk your way into - and out of - any situation you desire.
You're adaptable enough to flirt with anyone - and people tend to fight over you. 

Your negative traits: 

You get easily bored in relationships, and tend to jump from person to person.
You tend to be a bit of a player - and have a high tolerance for drama in relationships.
Not the most emphathetic person, you tend to tell lovers to "get over" their problems. 

Your ideal partner: 

Is intelligent and quick witted enough to keep you interested.
Is a bit of a shape shifter, providing you with the variety you crave.
An open minded person, who's willling to have a non-traditional relationship. 

Your dating style: 

Exciting. If your date shows you a new experience (like Egyptian food or scuba diving), you're very happy. 

Your seduction style: 

Experimental: it's rare that you try the same thing twice.
Ultra kinky - you do stuff that's not even in books yet.
Hot and cold... sometimes you're just not into the whole sex thing. 

Tips for the future: 

Settle down a little. Sometimes good things come with time - so don't let people go so fast.
Acknowledge that you're a player and flirt. If your mate can't live with this, find someone who can.
Give your partner a little more attention. You don't have to be a social butterfly all the time. 

Best place to meet someone online: 

Match.com - enough sexy singles for you to find a new playmate when you get restless 

Best color to attract mate: Sunny yellow 

Best day for a date: Wednesday

you ever get that feeling when you just feel like your floating. not like im so high kinda way. but seriously, sometimes things get so bad that they can only get better and when things get real bad, its those very few that can still make you smile. like your parentals take away everything but then you go cosmic bowling and you act like everything is alright and you have the best time of your life. or your mom doesnt sign your licence papers but then you go to Islands and get whip cream smashed in your face for no appearent reason, but its cool tho cause you got them back in a random place on their cheek.its funny how people you love can take your dark and gloomy world and make it sunny again. can they do that just because you love them? or do you love them because of it? hmmmm, thats weird to think about.

this is to my two: (you know who you are)

And all the roads we have to walk are winding

And all the lights that lead us there are blinding

There are many things that I would

 Like to say to you but I don't know how

Because maybe

You're gonna be the one that saves me ?

And after all

You're my wonderwall

fill this out and i will love you forever.
=o)


1. Who are you and what do I call you? 
2. Are we friends? 
3. When and how did we meet (tell the story if there is one)? 
4. How have I affected you? 
5. What do you think of me? 
6. What's the fondest memory you have of me?
7. How long do you think we will be friends?
8. Do you love me?
9. Do you have a crush on me? 
10. Would you kiss me? 
11. Would you hug me?
12. Physically, what stands out? 
13. Emotionally, what stands out? 
14. Do you wish I was cooler? 
15. On a scale of 1-10, how hot am I? 
16. Give me a nickname and explain why you picked it.
17. Am I loveable? 
18. How long have you known me?
19. Describe me in one word. 
20. What was your first impression? 
21. Do you still think that way about me now? 
22. What do you think my weakness is? 
23. Do you think I'll get married?
24. What makes me happy?
25. What makes me sad?

ya know. friendships are weird. there is just so much giving and taking that sometimes people lose that line to where it shows to much is too much. friends are such a big part of our lives. i mean when i look back at my life, i think i would be nothing without those best friends that have come and unfortunately gone, i try to stay positive. i was so comfortable in vegas. i felt liek everything was stable. gonna grad with my best friends from kindergarden, gonna be that lifer that i always dreamed of way back in first grade. i had jord and i had liz and i had Jeff. everything was great. then i was torn apart. as this school year comes to a close, i looked at what i had. and i still have Jord, i still have Liz and Jeff is still by my side. the only thing differnt is i have more people that i dont think i could life without. im the new kid. i understand that. there is no way i can compete with people you have known since forever.love is love. if u want me to back off i will. just be honest. please
